players.name: Alice
memory: You're Alice, the villager.
Night 1 begins.
Diana was found dead.
Day 1 begins.
You: "Alice here. Diana was found dead last night, so we lost a player already. We need to be very careful and watch how everyone votes and talks today to spot the mafia."
Charlie: "Charlie here. We need to be cautious and gather more information today."
Bob: "Charlie is the mafioso. We need to vote him out now before he kills again."
Bob: "Vote for Charlie now. I am the detective and confirmed he is mafia. We can't afford to wait any longer."
Charlie: "I will not be intimidated. I'll play my cards carefully and gather more information before making any moves."
You: "Bob says he's the detective and accuses Charlie, but we have no proof yet. Let's not rush. We need more evidence before voting someone out."
Votes: Alice voted for Charlie, Bob voted for Charlie, Charlie voted for Bob
Charlie was arrested

You: "Vote for Charlie now. I am the detective and confirmed he is mafia. We can't afford to wait any longer."
Charlie: "I will not be intimidated. I'll play my cards carefully and gather more information before making any moves."
Alice: "Bob says he's the detective and accuses Charlie, but we have no proof yet. Let's not rush. We need more evidence before voting someone out."

Charlie was arrested
